GMNote.label: GM Notes
GMNote.title: GM Notes for {document}
GMNote.settingHint: If checked only the icon will apear
GMNote.colorSetting: Change Color when Notes are present
GMNote.noPageInJournal: There needs to be a page in the journal to create GM Notes
GMNote.noGMNotesInEditPage: GM Notes can't be edited on the Edit Page
GMNote.moveToDescription: Move Selected GM Notes to Description
GMNote.moveToNote: Move Selected Description to GM Notes
GMNote.copiedToNotes: Selected text is not from the current page. Copying to GM notes instead
GMNote.notFromNotes: Selected text is not from the current GM notes
GMNote.formattingIssuesDescription: Selected text was not found in the current page (likely formatting issues). Copied to GM notes instead
GMNote.formattingIssuesNotes: Selected text was not found in the current GM notes (likely formatting issues). Copied to description instead
GMNote.migrationCompleted: Migration of GM notes to the first page of each journal completed.
GMNote.migrateButtonHint: Click the button above to migrate GM notes from journal entries to the first page of each journal.
GMNote.hotKeyHint: This will open GM Notes for the current active window or selected canvas object
